**Step 04:** While applying the applicants must super scribe the envelope &quot;Application for Scholarship&quot;. The applicant must write down Name, Complete contact address including native district. 
**Step 05:** The applicant needs to attach all the relevant documents and forward the duly filled application form through the Head of Educational Institutions which has to be submitted to the concerned District Social Justice Officers.
